content: this beginner friendly scarf pattern has a fun texture i love how it feels when i run my fingers over the finished stitches and a cozy comfortable fit i ve even included instructions to allow you to make a project to your own custom size using any yarn and hook combo you d like you can find this extra information in my blog post a photo and video tutorial are available for the herringbone half double stitch 1 and a video tutorial is available for the scarf for beginners too 2 > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until november 20 > 2023 at 11 59 pm et for cal > participants simply add the pattern > to your cart before 11 59 pm est on > november 20th and it will show as > $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on november 19 2023 at 7 00 pm est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2023 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/herringbone-half-double-crochet-stitch/ 2 https //youtu be/lm_olktfaas
